headline: Show HN: Squads – Social Trading for Web3
description:
hey hey! I'm the co-founder of squads -- a product that makes it easy to see what your friends and top investors are doing in web3.

This product was developed out my own frustration trying to get more involved in web3. One of the greatest challenges in the crypto space is figuring out where to start. For some of us, we're lucky to have a friend who can serve as a guide, and we wanted to build a product that would make introducing your friends to crypto a more inviting experience.

There is so much alpha and information living on Twitter + Discord, but the problem is finding the signal from the noise. With Squads, you don't have to sift through all of the noise -- you can see what the best players in the space are doing the moment they do it.

With this product, you don't have to sit in hundreds of discords and become inundated with notifications. Instead, you can follow who you think is interesting, and see a feed of their activity all in one place.

Some quick product highlights: - Social layer for web3 -- create a squad and share the invite link with your friends or anyone else. We took inspiration from discord for the invitation flow, try it out!

- Web3 Feed: see what activity is taking place in any of your squads, or from individual wallets that you follow

- Profile Page: Showcase all of your digital assets, and your performance, all in one place

- Social Graph: Follow your friends or favorite people on the blockchain

- Search: Search for any wallet address or ens domain
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 小队--Web3的社会交易
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 小隊--Web3的社會交易
description_zh-Hans:
嘿嘿 我是squads的联合创始人 -- 这个产品可以让你很容易地看到你的朋友和顶级投资者在web3中做什么。

这个产品的开发是出于我自己试图更多地参与web3的挫折感。对于我们中的一些人来说，我们很幸运，有一个朋友可以作为向导，我们想建立一个产品，使你的朋友介绍加密货币成为一个更有吸引力的经验。

在Twitter + Discord上有这么多的阿尔法和信息，但问题是在噪音中找到信号。有了Squads，你不必筛选所有的噪音--你可以看到这个空间里最好的玩家在做什么，他们在做什么。

有了这个产品，你不必坐在数以百计的对话中，被通知所淹没。相反，你可以关注你认为有趣的人，并在一个地方看到他们的活动。

一些快速的产品亮点。 - Web3的社交层--创建一个小队，并与你的朋友或其他人分享邀请链接。我们从discord的邀请流程中获得了灵感，试试吧！

- Web3馈送：查看你的任何团队或你关注的个人钱包正在进行的活动

- 简介页面。展示你所有的数字资产，以及你的表现，都在一个地方

- 社交图表。在区块链上关注你的朋友或喜欢的人

- 搜索。搜索任何钱包地址或sens域名
